data.comment: In the minute -5, Eduardo (Ceara) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
Rafael Moura (Goias) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The big names in today's match at Estadio Castelao have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Estadio Castelao - Ceara kick-off to start the match.
In the minute 1, Fernando Sobral (Ceara) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Goias have a goal kick.
Goal! Goias have got their heads in front thanks to a Rafael Moura strike.
In the minute 2, That's a fine assist from Breno.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 5, Rafael Moura for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goias's half?
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ceara close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Goias needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 11, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 14, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Ceara's Samuel Xavier misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 16, Ramon Abatti Abel awards Goias a goal kick.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Throw-in Ceara.
In Fortaleza Ceara attack through Rafael Sobis. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara's Charles gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goias defender.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Ceara.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vinicius Goes of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 22, Goias have a goal kick.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, In Fortaleza Ceara drive forward through Felipe Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Goias's area.
Felipe Silva (Ceara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Ceara push forward at Estadio Castelao and Samuel Xavier gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goias defence.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Ceara throw-in in Goias's half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Ceara's Charles gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Ceara.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Goias pushes forward through David Duarte, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Goias.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Goias.
Ceara are caught offside.
Throw-in for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 38, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Goal kick for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
At Estadio Castelao, Goias are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 40, Ceara are whistled for offside.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 41, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Ceara throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara drives forward and Fernando Sobral gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Goias a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fortaleza.
In the minute 45, Vinicius Goes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Goias.
In the minute 45, Ceara's Tiago has run offside.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Fortaleza.
In the minute 46, Goias have kicked-off the second half at Estadio Castelao.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 46, Ceara to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a first substitution, with Cleber Bomfim replacing Rafael Sobis.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Ceara throw-in in Goias's half.
In Fortaleza, Ceara push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 48, In Fortaleza Ceara's Vinicius Goes is caught offside.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 51, Free kick Ceara.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Charles grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 53, Samuel Xavier instrumental with a fine assist.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara push upfield but Ramon Abatti Abel quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 55, Ramon Abatti Abel awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Goias.
Vinicius Goes (Ceara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 57, Ceara advance rapidly upfield but Ramon Abatti Abel blows for offside.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Leandro Carvalho with Manucho. This is the second substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
In the minute 62, Daniel is on a sub for Daniel Villalva for Goias.
Daniel Villalva is booked for the away team.
Goias make their second substitution with Douglas Baggio replacing Vinicius Lopes.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ramon Abatti Abel blows against Ceara's Tiago for offside.
Free kick in a good position for Goias!
In the minute 64, At Estadio Castelao, Tiago has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Ceara are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Fabio Sanches is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goias drive upfield and Rafael Moura gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ceara defender.
In the minute 67, Goias have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Fabio Sanches, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Heron is the substitute for Goias.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Ceara.
Fabio Sanches for Goias is back on the field again.
In the minute 69, Ceara have a goal kick.
Ceara are pushing forward but Vinicius Goes's finish is wide of the goal.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Castelao, Goias are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 73, Goal! Vinicius Goes gives Ceara a 2-1 lead.
Great play from Bruno Pacheco to set up the goal.
Goias have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 76, Free kick Goias.
Gabriel Lacerda is replacing Tiago for the home team.
In the minute 78, In Fortaleza, David Duarte of Goias is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Wescley replacing Vinicius Goes.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 79, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Rafael Moura of Goias smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 80, Goias have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Goias's David Duarte attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Lucao Do Break is replacing Rafael Moura for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
The away team replace Daniel Bessa with Ignacio Jara.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goias just outside Ceara's area.
Fernando Sobral (Ceara) has received a yellow card from Ramon Abatti Abel.
Lucao Do Break (Goias) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 87, Goias's Tadeu gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goias's Caju breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Ceara make their fifth substitution with Martha replacing Ricardinho.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Throw-in Goias.
Goias to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
At Estadio Castelao the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Ceara.
In Fortaleza, Ceara push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ceara are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ceara are coming forward and Fernando Sobral gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
The match has come to a close in Fortaleza. The final score is 2-2.
David Duarte (Goias) nets with a header to make it 2-2 at Estadio Castelao.
That's a fine assist from Edilson.
Heron (Goias) gets a yellow card.
